person.persName: Hiram H. Smith (Webster Co., Ky, farmer and state rep)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Kentucky native. Father of Ben F. Smith, Rachael D. Smith, Charles Smith, John Smith, and Willie Smith. Married to Elizabeth Von Nichols Rice Smith in Hopkins County on April 22, 1856. Stepfather of Laban M. Rice and Nannie Rice. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Hopkins County in 1840. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Hopkins County from 1859 to 1861. Farmer in Webster County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860. Household owned an additional nine enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860.
